Package com.github.tnakamot.jscdg.json

Class JSONText

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.tnakamot.jscdg.json.JSONText
  • public class JSONText
extends Object
    Represents one JSON text.

    Instances of this class are immutable.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Reads JSON text from a file and returns an instance of JSONText for further processing.

      • get

        public String get()
        Returns:

      • source

        public Object source()
        Return the object which represents the source of this JSON text.
        Returns:
        An instance of File, URL or String.

      • tokens

        public List<JSONToken> tokens​(JSONParserErrorMessageFormat errMsgFmt)
                       throws IOException,
                              JSONParserException
        Tokenize this JSON text.
        Parameters:
        errMsgFmt - settings of error message format of JSONParserException
        Returns:
        Sequence of JSON tokens.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        JSONParserException - if there is a syntax error in JSON text

      • tokens

        public List<JSONToken> tokens()
                       throws IOException,
                              JSONParserException
        Tokenize this JSON text.
        Returns:
        Sequence of JSON tokens.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        JSONParserException - if there is a syntax error in JSON text

      • parse

        public JSONValue parse​(JSONParserErrorMessageFormat errMsgFmt)
                throws IOException,
                       JSONParserException
        Parse this JSON text.
        Parameters:
        errMsgFmt - settings of error message format of JSONParserException
        Returns:
        the root JSON value, or null if there is no value.
        Throws:
        JSONParserException - if there is a syntax error in the JSON text
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        See Also:
        RFC 8259 - 2. JSON Grammer

      • parse

        public JSONValue parse()
                throws IOException,
                       JSONParserException
        Parse this JSON text.
        Returns:
        the root JSON value, or null if there is no value.
        Throws:
        JSONParserException - if there is a syntax error in the JSON text
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        See Also:
        RFC 8259 - 2. JSON Grammer

      • name

        public String name()
        Return a string which represents a short name of the source of this JSON text. This is useful to construct an error message of JSON parsers.
        Returns:
        name of this JSON text.

      • fullName

        public String fullName()
        Return a string which represents the full path of the source of this JSON text. This is useful to construct an error message of JSON parsers.
        Returns:
        full path of this JSON text.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • fromFile

        public static JSONText fromFile​(File file)
                         throws IOException
        Reads JSON text from a file and returns an instance of JSONText for further processing. The file must be encoded using UTF-8.
        Parameters:
        file - JSON text file.
        Returns:
        An instance of JSON text.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of an I/O error
        See Also:
        RFC 8259 - 8.1. Character Encoding

      • fromURL

        public static JSONText fromURL​(URL url)
                        throws IOException
        Reads JSON text from a URL and returns an instance of JSONText for further processing. The text must be encoded using UTF-8.
        Parameters:
        url - URL of a JSON text file.
        Returns:
        An instance of JSON text.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O exception occurs
        See Also:
        RFC 8259 - 8.1. Character Encoding

      • fromString

        public static JSONText fromString​(String str)
        Convert the given String to an instance of JSONText.
        Parameters:
        str - A string which contains JSON text.
        Returns:
        An instance of JSON text.
        See Also:
        RFC 8259 - 8.1. Character Encoding
